channel.title: Update Timer?
channel.description: Hi =) I was wondering if there was some command for people with player rights 3 to put like ::updatein 10:00 then it will show a yellow text at the top saying update in 10:00 and counting down, kind of like runescape! I use marcscape server 317... Thanks

item.title: Update Timer?
item.dc:creator: @Jingojohn Jingojohn
item.description:
@Jingojohn wrote:

I get an error when I tried to use it. What do I put in the playerCommand.split(" ")

Your code is wrong. This is the right code, I fixed it:

if (command.startsWith("update")&& playerRights >= 3) { String[] args = command.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

I removed player in playerCommand and then brought the double ampersand back a space. That kept the error from happening.

Read full topic

item.title: Update Timer?
item.dc:creator: @Jingojohn Jingojohn
item.description:
@Jingojohn wrote:

I wonder if it is possible. But if anything, it would be a program, like a server restarter that counts down. I made custom commands.
Feel free to use them :).

[code=html4]
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Up1”) && playerRights >= 3) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (“Server update in 1 minute!”);
sendMessage(“Update message sent!”);
}

    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Up2") && playerRights >= 3) {
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("Server update in 2 minutes!");
        sendMessage("Update message sent!"); 
    }

    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Up3") && playerRights >= 3) {
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("Server update in 3 minutes!");
        sendMessage("Update message sent!"); 
    }


    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Up4") && playerRights >= 3) {
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("Server update in 4 minutes!");
        sendMessage("Update message sent!"); 
    }

    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Up5") && playerRights >= 3) {
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("Server update in 5 minutes!");
        sendMessage("Update message sent!"); 
    }[/code]

The “Up” stands for update. Hope I helped!
This is just a manual code for server updates.
Rep is appreciated!

Read full topic
